name: Maggot Colony
description:
Maggot Colony is an RTS game about decimating alien gigantic insects from our mother planet.

Game's goal

To win the game, you should destroy all enemy's nests before they invade your base and destroy you! You have exactly 5 minutes before invasion starts!

BindActionCDeselect all units
EscInvoke pause menu

HeavyBro - Programming & Art

Mewra - Page design

Zaderlon - SFX & Music
